items.title: Spider-man No Way Home
items.description: With Spider and Doctor Strange's help, Peter Parker must overcome his greatest challenge yet, changing the past to save the future.

items.title: The Black Phone
items.description: A young man is held captive by a deranged serial killer and must use the wisdom of the children's books he writes to outwit him.

items.title: Jurassic World Dominion
items.description: The epic conclusion of the Jurassic era, where dinosaurs and humans must learn to coexist.

items.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
items.description: The untold story of one 12-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

items.title: The Irishman
items.description: An old and retired hitman reflects on his life and all the hits he's done.

items.title: Matrix Resurrection
items.description: The Matrix is back, but this time, Neo must choose between his love for Trinity and his duty to save humanity.

items.title: Hustle
items.description: A washed-up basketball scout discovers a phenomenal street ball player and sees the opportunity to get back in the game.

items.title: Rebecca
items.description: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

items.title: Joker
items.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

items.title: Extraction
items.description: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

items.title: Anna
items.description: Beneath Anna Poliatova's striking beauty lies a secret that will unleash her indelible strength and skill to become one of the world's most feared government assassins.

items.title: Doctor Strange
items.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

items.title: Blackout
items.description: A young man must survive an island-wide blackout that threatens to plunge the world into darkness.

items.title: Eternals
items.description: The Eternal beings who shaped the Earth's history must reunite to protect humanity from their evil counterparts, the Deviants.

items.title: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.title: John Wick
items.description: An ex hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

items.title: Narvik
items.description: A group of mercenaries must work together to stop the world from falling into chaos.

items.title: Prey
items.description: to survive, a group of friends must outsmart a predator who has been hunting them for centuries.

items.title: Shershah
items.description: The story of the brave soldier Vikram Batra, who sacrificed his life in the Kargil War and was awarded the Param Vir Chakra posthumously.

items.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
items.description: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

items.title: Tenet
items.description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

items.title: Venom
items.description: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

items.title: The Adams Family
items.description: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.

items.title: How to Train Your Dragon
items.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

items.title: Encanto
items.description: A young Colombian becomes frustrated as the only member of her family without magical powers. When she discovers a candle with the power to grant wishes, she must save her family from ruin.

items.title: The Incredibles 2
items.description: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

items.title: The Lion King
items.description: After the assassination of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

items.title: Ron's Gone Wrong
items.description: A socially awkward middle-schooler befriends a malfunctioning robot, which becomes an instant hit.

items.title: Scoob!
items.description: Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As being the first animated Scooby-Doo feature film, it is intended to be the first film of a proposed set-up for a Hanna-Barbera Cinematic Universe.

items.title: The Sea Beast
items.description: A legendary sea monster hunter's life is turned upside down when a young and determined journalist seeks to find the truth behind his tall tales.

items.title: Wendell & Wild
items.description: Two demon brothers face off against a nun and a pair of goth teens.

items.title: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
items.description: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

items.title: Breaking Bad
items.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

items.title: Game of Thrones
items.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

items.title: How I Met Your Mother
items.description: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

items.title: Friends
items.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

items.title: Wednesday
items.description: A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.

items.title: Mr. Robot
items.description: Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation he works for.

items.title: The Witcher
items.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

items.title: Narcos
items.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

items.title: Better Call Saul
items.description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the time before he established his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

items.title: Dark
items.description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.
